name: A Remote Planet (V)
Lore: 'In unfamiliar and potentially hostile territory, Qui-Gon knew that success would require patience and caution.',
Text: 'Deploy on The Hyperdrive Generator''s Gone: treat ''4'' on it as ''2''. Your Force generation at City Outskirts is +1. May deploy systems regardless of your Objective deployment restrictions. Once per game, may deploy Qui-Gon or Obi-Wan (an/or their matching weapon_ from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)',
